author: Simon Difford
description: Bénédictine adds both saffron flavour and vivid yellow colour to this cognac based cocktail with maraschino contributing fruity notes. Champagne dries and provides effervescence and body to this well-balanced cocktail.
name: The Dandy
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
